name: Spider Solitaire (Full)
description:
World’s first Spider Solitaire with live cards! Popular Spider Solitaire is now available! The greatest way to escape from daily bustle wherever you are. Great graphics and relaxing background music add even more enjoyment to playing. Your goal is to remove all cards from the table (10 columns with 44 cards face down, 10 cards face up and 50 cards in stock). Move cards to create a complete suit (ordered from king to ace) and remove it. Tap the stock to add new 10 cards (you can’t deal new cards if there are empty columns).

• Large, easy to manipulate cards
• Full undo
• Three difficulty levels
• Hints
• Tutorial
• Smooth 3D animations
• Relaxing background music
• Customized background
• Possibility to fill an empty deck
• You can restart the game with the same card deal
• Google Play Games: leaderboards and achievements!

Try our other Solitare games: Solitaire (Klondike), Freecell Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire!

This is fully functional version without commercials.
